node.excerpt:
Hello, and welcome to my humble corner in the Internet. This is where I'll focus on writing about software engineering, programming and lifestyle.

As I'm hosting the blog on GitHub Pages, there are no comments for now. However, you can always reach me on Twitter - @{{ site.author.twitter_username }} - or by email.

Hi. I'm Ant√≥nio.

I'm a Software Engineer with a passion for entrepreneurship and open-source software.

During the day, I am an engineer at Ladder in California, helping reshape life insurance. When I'm not doing that, I help out with the OCaml and ReasonML ecosystem.

I also build Lumo, a fast, cross-platform, standalone ClojureScript environment.

Setup

In case you're wondering, this site is:

  • Built on Jekyll and Lanyon;
  • Hosted on GitHub Pages
  • Coded in Emacs

Feel free to get in touch:
